skill.name: web-artifacts-builder
skill.description: Suite of tools for creating elaborate, multi-component claude.ai HTML artifacts using modern frontend web technologies (React, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui). Use for complex artifacts requiring state management, routing, or shadcn/ui components - not for simple single-file HTML/JSX artifacts.
skill.summary: Suite of tools for creating elaborate, multi-component claude.ai HTML artifacts using modern fronten...

security_audit.summary: Official skill from Anthropic with simple local shell scripts for scaffolding and bundling. No suspicious patterns or network exfiltration logic observed.

content.value_statement: You need complex Claude artifacts with modern UI and state. This skill scaffolds React, Tailwind, and shadcn, then bundles a single shareable HTML file.
actual_capabilities: Create a Vite React TypeScript project with pnpm
Configure Tailwind CSS and shadcn theme defaults
Add path aliases to tsconfig and Vite
Install Radix and shadcn ui dependencies
Bundle a project into one HTML file with Parcel and html-inline
limitations: Requires Node.js 18 or higher and pnpm
Runs local shell scripts and modifies files
Bundling requires a root index.html file
No automatic testing or deployment steps

use_cases.title: Prototype complex UI
use_cases.description: Scaffold a React app with shadcn and ship a single HTML artifact for review.

use_cases.title: Interactive demo
use_cases.description: Build a styled prototype with Tailwind and export a shareable artifact.

use_cases.title: Teaching module
use_cases.description: Create a multi-page learning demo and bundle it into one HTML file.

prompt_templates.title: Quick start setup
prompt_templates.prompt: Initialize a React Vite project named demo-artifact and set up Tailwind and shadcn. Then tell me the next steps to start dev.

prompt_templates.title: Bundle my artifact
prompt_templates.prompt: Bundle my current artifact into one HTML file and tell me where the output is saved.

prompt_templates.title: Add alias support
prompt_templates.prompt: Ensure my tsconfig and Vite config support the @ path alias for src, then summarize the changes.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced UI build
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a new artifact project and include a dashboard layout using shadcn components. Provide the files I should edit first.

output_examples.input: Set up a new artifact project named climate-dashboard and explain how to run it.
output: Created a Vite React TypeScript project named climate-dashboard
Configured Tailwind CSS and shadcn theme defaults
Next steps: cd climate-dashboard and run pnpm dev

best_practices: Use Node 18 or higher for compatibility
Keep index.html in the project root for bundling
Run bundling only after the UI is stable
anti_patterns: Using this for simple single file HTML artifacts
Deleting index.html or moving it to subfolders

faq.question: Which environments are compatible?
faq.answer: It requires Node.js 18 or higher and pnpm on macOS, Linux, or Windows with bash.

faq.question: Are there size limits for artifacts?
faq.answer: There is no enforced limit, but large bundles may load slowly in the artifact viewer.

faq.question: Can I integrate with an existing React project?
faq.answer: Yes, but bundling expects a root index.html and Vite style structure.

faq.question: Does it send data anywhere?
faq.answer: No, the scripts run locally and do not upload your code.

faq.question: What if bundling fails?
faq.answer: Check pnpm install, ensure index.html exists, and rerun the bundle script.

faq.question: How is this different from simple HTML skills?
faq.answer: This supports React, Tailwind, and shadcn for complex UI and state management.
